name: dfs.qjournal.accept-recovery.timeout.ms
explanation: The configuration for the quorum timeout during the recovery phase is missing. This could potentially cause issues with task recovery and speculation.

name: yarn.nodemanager.elastic-memory-control.timeout-sec
explanation: The timeout for elastic memory control in the node manager is set to a very short duration. This could potentially cause issues with memory allocation during task execution.

name: dfs.datanode.max.locked.memory
explanation: The maximum locked memory for the datanode is set to 0, which disables in-memory caching. This could potentially cause performance issues during task execution.
